stimulusHtml: What is the direction of the net magnetic force on Wire A due to the other two wires?

features.html: The figure shows three long wires perpendicular to the plane of the figure and equidistant from each other. Two of the wires carry current into the plane, and the third carries current out of the plane. All three currents are equal in magnitude.

choicesHtml: Toward the bottom of the figure
Toward the top of the figure
